FlawlessAttacksAppliesToAttackCount.Description: Flawless Attacks reduction of the iterative attack penalty now also makes you get a new attack every four BAB (Not working ATM).

DispelsAreBuffSafe.Description: Dispel Magic, Greater Dispel Magic, and Slayer Dispelling Attacks should no longer dispel buffs on the casters allies or debuffs on enemies.

DawnOfDragonsRewardFeaturize.Description: Converts the Holy Aura you get from siding with the silver dragon in Dawn Of Dragons to a feature from a permabuff to make it harder to lose and clear what is up

DawnOfDragonsCustomRewardAngelOnly.Description: Replaces the redundant perma-Holy-Aura effect with a more thematic perk - bit of cold weapon damage and cold resist. Select this to only do the replacement for Angel.

DawnOfDragonsCustomRewardEveryone.Description: Do the replacement for everyone, not just Angel.

MovanicDevasWeaponFix.Description: Fixes Movanic Devas to greatswords as per TT rather than longswords wielded in both hands, making their damage quite a bit less bad.
